t: Amazon Is Launching Its Own Shark Tank Where Winners Get To Be Amazon Sellers - Slashdot
s: Contestants pitch their ideas to the audience. If the crowd votes for them, then the panelists pick which ones will show up on Amazon's Buy It Now Store: a new storefront launching alongside the show that viewers can reach using a QR code that shows up during episodes.
